prompt_base: cinematic photograph of a beautiful East-Asian woman, long straight black hair in an elegant bun, wearing a traditional blue qipao and a soft pink silk scarf
feature_prompt: subtle subsurface scattering on skin, detailed hair strands, fabric texture on qipao and silk scarf
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, plastic texture, smooth hair, exaggerated eyes, flat lighting, low quality, messy bun, neon colors
